name: GTAthen
description:
Ever wanted to play a GTA style game set in the ancient greece? Now you can!

It was made for a gamejam in 2014, so it is not very finished, but I like the concept. So I uploaded it anyway :)

Controls: WASD and Space

You need to install löve to play this: https://love2d.org/

Sonen gamejam, theme: Geometry

  • Main programmer: Simen Heggestøyl
  • Art and programming: Thor Merlin Lervik

2014
